org.kitteh.irc.client.library.util

Enum Format

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Format>
      • org.kitteh.irc.client.library.util.Format
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Format>

    public enum Format
extends Enum<Format>
    Represents various formatting available in IRC.

    The toString method provides the String you need.

        Returns:
        the enum constant with the specified name
        Throws:
